definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: The viscous flow activation energy was higher than that of the viscose solution.

sentences.english: Desorption activating energy and pre-exponential factor were calculated.
sentences.chinese: 求出脫附活化能和指前因子。

sentences.english: The key of oxygen activation logging interpretation was water-flow velocity which determined every measuring point.

sentences.english: There was a relationship between the conductance activation energy and detergency.
sentences.chinese: 電導活化能與洗滌效果之間有一定的關係。

sentences.english: Activating process not always improve the anti-coking ability of coal char.
sentences.chinese: 活化後並不一定能提高煤焦的抗積碳性能。

sentences.english: The serpentine could be used repeatedly by activation and regeneration.
sentences.chinese: 蛇紋石經活化再生後可反覆循環使用。

sentences.english: The instrumental neutron activation analysis was used to determine Cr content in chromium-rich yeast cells.

sentences.english: Consequently, the molecular mediators regulating the secretion of salt and fluid in the gut do not get fully activated.
sentences.chinese: 結果，調控腸道水鹽分泌的調節分子未獲得充分活化。

sentences.english: The mechanism of activated reaction in preparing of desulfurizer, from coal Was studied.

sentences.english: The activation energy, before you can have reaction.
sentences.chinese: 這就是反應發生之前的活化能。

sentences.chinese: 對其活化機理進行了探討。

sentences.english: The activated glassy carbon electrode obtained by electrochemical means could adsorb the lead cation in solution.
sentences.chinese: 經電化學活化後的玻璃碳電極可吸附溶液中的鉛離子。

sentences.english: The activation barriers for the exited - state reactions are lower than that of the ground- state.
sentences.chinese: 計算結果表明，激發態反應活化位壘都比基態的低。

sentences.english: Study on electrochemical behaviour of ethinylestradiol at a glassy carbon electrode;
sentences.chinese: 經電化學活化後的玻璃碳電極可吸附溶液中的鉛離子。

sentences.english: The mechanism of deactivation is analyzed. According to the mechanism several activators are selected.

sentences.english: They promote the proliferation of PHA, ConA or LPS-activated lymphocytes.
sentences.chinese: 有促進活化的淋巴細胞增殖的效應。

definition: chemotaxis (movement of leukocytes under chemical stimulus)
